title: Bug 10593: Jar export should add ".jar" suffix if not specified
OB: When using Build 20020228, if some files are selected for export and the jar export option is chosen, and the user enters "test" as the jar name, a jar file called "test" is created instead of using "test.jar".
EB: The jar export should automatically add the ".jar" suffix to the jar file name if it is not specified by the user. In this case, the jar file should be named "test.jar".
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Use Build 20020228. 2. Select some files for export. 3. Choose the jar export option. 4. Enter "test" as the jar name. 5. Check the created jar file, it should be named "test.jar".
